definition: to promote lactation/to stimulate lactation (e.g. with drug)
to urge/to press/to prompt/to rush sb/to hasten sth/to expedite

sentences.english: Levels of serotonin and prolactin were not influenced by music therapy.
sentences.chinese: 血清素和催乳激素則未有改善。

sentences.english: The progestational hormone of large dose controls the secrete breast function of the element that urge breast.
sentences.chinese: 大劑量的孕激素抑制催乳素的泌乳作用。

sentences.english: It has the certain function of animal health care; The function of helping lactate is not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 葛根素具有一定的動物保健作用，催乳作用不顯著。

sentences.english: Clinical efficacy of pergolide in the treatment of hyperprolactinemia was observed.
sentences.chinese: 對培高利特治療高催乳素血癥進行臨牀療效觀察。

sentences.english: Beral thinks a more interesting candidate for study is prolactin.
sentences.chinese: 蓓拉爾想到個很有趣的研究方案，催乳素。

sentences.english: In tests, animals injected with prolactin became drowsy immediately.
sentences.chinese: 在試驗中，動物注射催乳素立即會變得昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: Prolactin produces a sense of satiety after orgasm.
sentences.chinese: 催乳素產生高潮後的滿足感。

sentences.english: Suckling causes the release of oxytocin and prolactin in the mother.
sentences.chinese: 吮吸導致母親體內催產素和催乳素的釋放。

sentences.english: Some women ovulate irregularly because their pituitary glands secrete too much prolactin.
sentences.chinese: 有些不規則排卵的患者垂體腺分泌過多催乳素。

definition: to promote lactation/to stimulate lactation (e.g. with drug)
woman hired to take care of a newborn child and its mother in the month after childbirth
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
to help a mother give birth
to convalesce for a month following childbirth, following a special diet, and observing various taboos to protect the body from exposure to the "wind"
to improve one's appearance (using cosmetics or cosmetic surgery)/to make oneself more attractive/to beautify
